attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2008-1795

Date: 2008-11-28

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Members (full-time) of the Canadian Artists and Producers Professional Relations Tribunal as set out in the schedule hereto, which per diem is within the range GCQ 3 ($99,300 - $116,800), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the remuneration of Members (part-time) of the Canadian Artists and Producers Professional Relations Tribunal as set out in the schedule hereto, which per diem is within the range GCQ 3 ($495 - $580),

effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary

of Members of the Canadian Transportation Agency as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 6 ($160,600 - $188,900), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary

of Temporary Members (full-time) of the Canadian Transportation Agency as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range

GCQ 6 ($160,600 - $188,900), effective April 1, 2008.


   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the remuneration of Temporary Members (part-time) of the Canadian Transportation Agency as set out in the schedule hereto, which per diem rate is within the range GCQ 6 ($800 - $940), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Permanent Members and Temporary Members of the Veterans Review and Appeal Board as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 3 ($99,300 - $116,800), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary

of Permanent Members of the Canadian International Trade Tribunal

as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range

GCQ 5 ($131,200 - $154,400), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Commissioner (Workers) and Commissioner (Employers) of the Canada Employment Insurance Commission as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 4 ($114,100 - $134,200), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary

of Assistant Commissioners of the Canadian Grain Commission

as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range

GCQ 2 ($86,000 - $101,200), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary

of Commissioners of the Canadian Grain Commission as set out

in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 5 ($131,200 - $154,400), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the remuneration of former full-time Members (Employees) and former

part-time Members (Employees) and of former full-time Members (Employers) and former part-time Members (Employers) of the Canada Industrial Relations Board as set out in the schedule hereto, which per diem is within the range GCQ 4 ($570 - $670), effective April 1, 2008.

 


   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the remuneration of Part-time Members (Employees) and of Part-time Members (Employers) of the Canada Industrial Relations Board as

set out in the schedule hereto, which per diem is within the range

GCQ 4 ($570 - $670), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Members (Employees) (full-time) and of Members (Employers) (full-time) of the Canada Industrial Relations Board as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 4 ($114,100 - $134,200), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the remuneration of former full-time Vice-Chairpersons and former part-time Vice-Chairpersons of the Canada Industrial Relations Board as set out

in the schedule hereto, which per diem rate is within the range

GCQ 6 ($800 - $940), effective April 1, 2008.

 


   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the remuneration of Part-Time Vice-Chairpersons of the Canada Industrial Relations Board as set out in the schedule hereto, which per diem rate is within the range GCQ 6 ($800 - $940), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of the Members (full-time) of the Copyright Board as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 4 ($114,100 - $134,200), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the remuneration of Members (part-time) of the Copyright Board

as set out in the schedule hereto, which per diem rate is within the range

GCQ 4 ($570 - $670), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary

of Members (full-time) of the Military Police Complaints Commission as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 3 ($99,300 - $116,800), effective April 1, 2008.

 

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the remuneration of Members (part-time) of the Military Police Complaints Commission as set out in the schedule hereto, which per diem rate is within the range GCQ 3 ($495 - $580), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the

salary of Permanent Members (full-time) and Temporary Members

(full-time) of the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission as set out

in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range

GCQ 5 ($131,200 - $154,400), effective April 1, 2008, except for the Permanent Member whose salary was fixed upon appointment by

OiC P.C. 2008-7 dated January 15, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the remuneration of Permanent Members (part-time) and Temporary Members (part-time) of the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission

as set out in the schedule hereto, which per diem rate is within the range GCQ 5 ($655 - $770), effective April 1, 2008.


   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the remuneration of Citizenship Judges (full-time) as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 2 ($86,000 - $101,200), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the remuneration of Citizenship Judges (part-time) as set out in the schedule hereto, which per diem rate is within the range GCQ 2 ($430 - $505), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Members of the National Energy Board as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 6 ($160,600 - $188,900), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary

of Temporary Members (full-time) of the National Energy Board

as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range

GCQ 6 ($160,600 - $188,900), effective April 1, 2008.


   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the remuneration of Temporary members (part-time) of the National Energy Board as set out in the schedule hereto, which per diem rate is

within the range GCQ 6 ($800 - $940), effective April 1, 2008,

except for the Temporary member whose remuneration was fixed upon appointment by OiC P.C. 2007-1074 dated June 27, 2007.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the remuneration of Members (part-time) of the Canadian Forces Grievance Board as set out in the schedule hereto, which per diem rate is within the range GCQ 2 ($430 - $505), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary

of Commissioners (full-time) of the International Joint Commission

as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range

GCQ 6 ($160,600 - $188,900), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the remuneration of Commissioners (part-time) of the International Joint Commission as set out in the schedule hereto, which per diem rate is within the range GCQ 6 ($800 - $940), effective April 1, 2008.

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary

of Assistant Deputy Chairpersons of the Immigration and Refugee Board as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range

GCQ 4 ($114,100 - $134,200), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary

of Full-Time Members of the Immigration and Refugee Board

as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range

GCQ 3 ($99,300 - $116,800), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the remuneration of Part-time Members of the Immigration and Refugee Board as set out in the schedule hereto, which per diem rate is within the range GCQ 3 ($495 - $580), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the remuneration of Members (full-time) of the National Parole Board,

as set out in schedule hereto, which salary is within the range

GCQ 4 ($114,100 - $134,200), effective April 1, 2008.

 

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the remuneration of Part-time Members of the National Parole Board

as set out in schedule hereto, which per diem rate is within the range GCQ 4 ($570 - $670), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the remuneration of the Commissioners of the Public Service Commission

as set out in the schedule hereto, which per diem rate is within the range

($680 - $800), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary

of Members (full-time) of the Canadian Human Rights Tribunal

as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range

GCQ 5 ($131,200 - $154,400), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the remuneration of Members (part-time) of the Canadian Human Rights Tribunal as set out in the schedule hereto, which per diem is within the range GCQ 5 ($655 - $770), effective April 1, 2008.

 

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the

salary of Lay Members (full-time) of the Competition Tribunal

as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range

GCQ 5 ($131,200 - $154,400), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the remuneration of Lay Members (part-time) of the Competition Tribunal as set out in the schedule hereto, which remuneration is within the range GCQ 5 ($655 - $770), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary

of Members (full-time) of the Public Service Labour Relations Board

as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($108,700 - $127,900), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the remuneration of Members (part-time) of the Public Service Labour Relations Board as set out in the schedule hereto, which per diem rate

is within the range GCQ 3 ($495 - $580), effective April 1, 2008.

 

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary

of Vice-Chairpersons of the Public Service Labour Relations Board

as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range

GCQ 5 ($126,200 - $148,500), effective April 1, 2007 and within the range

GCQ 5 ($131,200 - $154,400), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary

of Members (full-time) of the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 5 ($131,200 - $154,400), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Members (full-time) of the Canadian Transportation Accident Investigation and Safety Board as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GCQ 4 ($114,100 - $134,200), effective April 1, 2008.

 


   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the remuneration of Members (part-time) of the Canadian Transportation Accident Investigation and Safety Board as set out in the schedule hereto, which per diem rate is within the range GCQ 4 ($570 - $670), effective April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary

of Permanent Members (full-time) and Temporary Members (full-time)

of the Public Service Staffing Tribunal as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($96,800 - $113,900), effective

April 1, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the remuneration of Permanent Members (part-time) and Temporary Members (part-time) of the Public Service Staffing Tribunal as set

out in the schedule hereto, which per diem rate is within the range ($470 - $550), effective April 1, 2008.
